title: Client will not complete update - help needed.
body: Patch 5.3 updates and stops at 1.5mb left, asks to send logs and i send them and nothing happens. picture below.

replies.body: okay seriously, uninstalled, reinstalled, sent logs, deleted project files, someone who actually knows a solution please look at the picture linked. it happens everytime. thankyou.

lol why would you deserve a reward for not being able to update? Doesn't make much sense :P

But anyway, have you tried reinstalling the entire game, ie. uninstalling League via the Control Panel, deleting all local content, restarting and then installing again? If you've been trying all the other "answers" then you would have been told to delete some folders from "project" at some point, which is nearly the same thing as this, except this will be removing and readding the game to your registry, which might net a better result!

Best of luck!
None of the other answers work with reconnecting to the internet or reloading patcher. but srs riot help a brother out. deserve some reward i feel
